name: Tower Accession
description:
A world of adventure awaits!

Explore a mysteries tower to find out the truth of its origins and make friends along the way. Engage in turn based battles and utilize a skill learning system to progress upwards!

A short game in RPG Make MV. I hope you enjoy it!

Art by Jason Perry https://itch.io/profile/finalbossblues , with plugins by Yanfly http://www.yanfly.moe/wiki/Main_Page and SRDude http://sumrndm.site/.
